one will be Thursday from

raw: way, is there anything  there anything special  which you want me  that fellen  impers  ürst  regard  n  nor  one will be Thursday from  9 to 12. Believe me, when der  clock strikes 12 Thursday, durel.  strike my Clack & white too!  I got a letter from Tommy  lelling ale that he has not yet  heard from his  received  home. He is  Een home any day, as  he has written about his  accomes with you  once to my knowledge. I  shall go to see him  New York and talk the matter  over with him  es  any  expec  V  w  Suve day  at lea  aga

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that Kwan will not be visiting Mrs. Lynde as planned and that Tommy (Lee) has not received money from home. Kwan asks for advice.
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
